thread.title: Where to stay in Melbourne when you're on a budget
thread.title_full: Where to stay in Melbourne when you're on a budget

title: Where to stay in Melbourne when you're on a budget
text:
Where to stay in Melbourne when you're on a budget Christina Pfeiffer | 6th Jul 2015 5:47 PM Christina Pfeiffer Cars For Sale 
Going to Melbourne but don't want to spend a fortune on accommodation? 
There are plenty of choices in Melbourne, from backpackers digs and budget hotels to five star. 
I recently popped into Melbourne's newest backpacker accommodation, United Backpackers and filmed a video. 
Read more about United Backpackers here and watch my video on Melbourne to decide if saving money on accommodation is the right thing for you. United Backpackers:
